<a id="TextMesh"></a>

# TextMesh

**Inherits:** [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md) **\<** [Mesh](Mesh.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Generate a [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md) from the text.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Generate a [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md) from the text.

TextMesh can be generated only when using dynamic fonts with vector glyph contours. Bitmap fonts (including bitmap data in the TrueType/OpenType containers, like color emoji fonts) are not supported.

The UV layout is arranged in 4 horizontal strips, top to bottom: 40% of the height for the front face, 40% for the back face, 10% for the outer edges and 10% for the inner edges.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [3D text](../tutorials/3d/3d_text.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="TextMesh_property_autowrap_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[AutowrapMode](TextServer.md#enum_TextServer_AutowrapMode) **autowrap_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#TextMesh_property_autowrap_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_autowrap_mode**\ (\ value\: [AutowrapMode](TextServer.md#enum_TextServer_AutowrapMode)\ )
- [AutowrapMode](TextServer.md#enum_TextServer_AutowrapMode) **get_autowrap_mode**\ (\ )

If set to something other than [TextServer.AUTOWRAP_OFF](TextServer.md#TextServer_constant_AUTOWRAP_OFF), the text gets wrapped inside the node's bounding rectangle. If you resize the node, it will change its height automatically to show all the text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextMesh_property_curve_step"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **curve_step** = `0.5` [ðŸ”—](#TextMesh_property_curve_step)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_curve_step**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_curve_step**\ (\ )

Step (in pixels) used to approximate BÃ©zier curves.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="TextMesh_property_depth"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **depth** = `0.05` [ðŸ”—](#TextMesh_property_depth)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_depth**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_depth**\ (\ )

Depths of the mesh, if set to ``0.0`` only front surface, is generated, and UV layout is changed to use full texture for the front face only.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

- [Font](Font.md) **get_font**\ (\ )

Font configuration used to display text.

- [HorizontalAlignment](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_HorizontalAlignment) **get_horizontal_alignment**\ (\ )

Controls the text's horizontal alignment. Supports left, center, right, and fill, or justify.

- [float](float.md) **get_line_spacing**\ (\ )

Additional vertical spacing between lines (in pixels), spacing is added to line descent. This value can be negative.

<a id="TextMesh_property_text"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **text** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#TextMesh_property_text)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_text**\ (\ value\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_text**\ (\ )

The text to generate mesh from.

\ **Note:** Due to being a [Resource](Resource.md), it doesn't follow the rules of [Node.auto_translate_mode](Node.md#Node_property_auto_translate_mode). If disabling translation is desired, it should be done manually with [Object.set_message_translation()](Object.md#Object_method_set_message_translation).
